---
category: news
title: "Renesas launches MPUs designed for entry-level AI-enabled applications."
excerpt: "Renesas has expanded its RZ/V Series of microprocessors (MPUs) with the addition of RZ/V2L MPUs that have been designed for entry-level AI-enabled applications. As part of the RZ/V Series, these MPUs incorporate Renesas’ exclusive AI accelerator – the DRP-AI (Dynamically Reconfigurable Processor) – which looks to make embedded AI easier and more power efficient."
